summary: Web app: remove unsupported home-screen widget UI and standardize date display format.
architectural_notes: Home-screen widgets (1x2, 2x2) are not supported in a web/PWA app; only shortcuts/app icons can be added, so widget-related UI should be removed or replaced.
known_issues: 'Open Widget' button does not work and adds a full app shortcut instead of a 1x2 widget on mobile home screen.

existing_features.title: Remove the Settings UI action that opens the widget view (the “Open Widget View” / open widget button) so users no longer see or can tap a widget-opening button in Settings.

Change the app’s default date display format to DD/MM/YY wherever dates are shown to the user, including date+time strings (date portion) and date-only strings (e.g., exports). Keep time formatting in 12-hour format with AM/PM unless a screen is currently time-only.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the 'Open Widget' / widget creation button from Settings since home-screen widgets are not supported.
Set default date format across the app to DD/MM/YY.

projectName: Remove Open Widget button and standardize date format to DD/MM/YY
